com.github.makiftutuncu.shoppingcart

Class Campaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.makiftutuncu.shoppingcart.Campaign

  • public class Campaign
extends java.lang.Object
    Campaign is a way to make discounts on a specific Category. It is valid for a specific number of different products in a specific category (or its parents). Campaign discounts are either fixed amounts or rates, see DiscountType

    • Method Detail

      • ofAmount

        public static Campaign ofAmount(Category category,
                                int numberOfItems,
                                int amount)
        Creates an amount-based campaign
        Parameters:
        category - Category of the campaign, cannot be null
        numberOfItems - Number of items for the campaign, must be positive
        amount - Amount of discount of the campaign, must be positive
        Returns:
        Created campaign

      • ofRate

        public static Campaign ofRate(Category category,
                              int numberOfItems,
                              double rate)
        Creates a rate-based campaign
        Parameters:
        category - Category of the campaign, cannot be null
        numberOfItems - Number of items for the campaign, must be positive
        rate - Rate of discount of the campaign, must be in (0, 1)
        Returns:
        Created campaign

        public Category category()
        Returns:
        Category of the campaign

        public int numberOfItems()
        Returns:

      • discountFor

        public int discountFor(int totalAmount)
        Calculates the discount amount to be applied
        Parameters:
        totalAmount - Total amount of products in this category
        Returns:
        Calculated amount or 0 if there won't be a discount
